job_tasks.phrase: Ontwerpen, ontwikkelen en implementeren van end-to-end webapplicaties met behulp van moderne frameworks en technologieën
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly describes the core activities of building and deploying web applications, which falls under traditional software development.

job_tasks.phrase: Bouwen van efficiënte en schaalbare back-endsystemen en API's voor naadloze gegevensintegratie
job_tasks.justification: This describes the creation of backend systems and APIs, a fundamental aspect of software engineering and integration.

job_tasks.phrase: Creëren van intuïtieve gebruikersinterfaces en boeiende gebruikerservaringen met behulp van HTML, CSS en JavaScript
job_tasks.justification: This refers to front-end development, a key part of building complete web applications and user experiences.

job_tasks.phrase: Samenwerken met interdisciplinaire teams om vereisten te verzamelen en deze te vertalen naar technische oplossingen
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly mentions collaboration with teams and translating requirements, which are core communication and collaboration skills.

job_tasks.phrase: Uitvoeren van grondige tests en debugging om de kwaliteit en prestaties van de ontwikkelde applicaties te waarborgen
job_tasks.justification: Testing and debugging are essential software development practices to ensure application quality and performance.

job_tasks.phrase: Bieden van technische ondersteuning en probleemoplossing voor bestaande softwaresystemen
job_tasks.justification: Providing technical support and troubleshooting existing systems are typical software engineering responsibilities.

job_tasks.phrase: Op de hoogte blijven van de nieuwste trends in de branche en opkomende technologieën om de ontwikkelingspraktijken voortdurend te verbeteren
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the need to stay updated with industry trends and emerging technologies, which is a key aspect of learning and adaptability in tech.

soft_skills.phrase: Samenwerken met interdisciplinaire teams om vereisten te verzamelen en deze te vertalen naar technische oplossingen
Op de hoogte blijven van de nieuwste trends in de branche en opkomende technologieën om de ontwikkelingspraktijken voortdurend te verbeteren

profile.rationale: The job advertisement focuses exclusively on traditional software development tasks such as designing, developing, and implementing web applications, building backend systems and APIs, and creating user interfaces. It mentions collaboration and staying updated with trends but contains no specific tasks or technologies related to AI/ML or Generative AI. Therefore, the role is classified as a 'Software Engineer'.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is very clear and specific about its requirements, focusing entirely on standard web development practices. There is no ambiguity or mention of AI/ML technologies, making the classification straightforward.
